mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name, user_nickname, user_head_portrait, user_sex, user_autograph, user_openid, user_mobile, user_mail, user_pass, last_login_time, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, status FROM user WHERE (user_mobile = #{userMobile} OR user_mail = #{userMail}) AND user_pass = #{userPass} AND status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (ryb.user.id, ryb.user.user_name, ryb.user.user_nickname, ryb.user.user_head_portrait, ryb.user.user_sex, ryb.user.user_autograph, ryb.user.user_openid, ryb.user.user_mobile, ryb.user.user_mail, ryb.user.user_pass, ryb.user.last_login_time, ryb.user.create_time, ryb.user.create_user, ryb.user.update_time, ryb.user.update_user, ryb.user.status) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userName}, #{userNickName}, #{userHeadPortrait}, #{userSex}, #{userAutograph}, #{userOpenid} , #{userMobile}, #{userMail}, #{userPass}, NOW(), NOW(), #{id}, NOW(), #{id}, 1)
